sections.text: Emergency take-down order. Upon the return of service date, if the plaintiff presents prima facie evidence that the image at issue is a private compromising image of the plaintiff, then the court shall enter an emergency take-down order, without a hearing, to have the image removed from the website immediately.

sections.heading: Damages. A person who is found to have posted a private compromising image of another person by a court shall be liable for damages
sections.text: The amount of damages shall be at the discretion of the court.

sections.heading: Liability. Nothing in this Act shall be construed to impose liability on an interactive computer service, as defined in 47 U
sections.text: S.C. 230(f)(2), for content provided by another person.
